articles.description: "Everything Everywhere All at Once" is the heart-tugging, absurdist comedy we never knew we needed. Now, it's expected to sweep the Oscars on Sunday.
articles.content:
A year ago, we never could have guessed that a film with hot-dog hands and a singing raccoon would win best picture.
But “Everything Everywhere All at Once” is predicted to do just that at Sunday’s … [+5142 chars]

articles.title: Woody Harrelson’s basketball role in new movie ‘Champions’ challenging, fulfilling - The Athletic
articles.description: In 1992, Harrelson played basketball in "White Men Can't Jump." In his new movie, he's coaching a team that delivered unexpected challenges.
articles.content:
Woody Harrelson is in a basketball movie. Thats nothing new.
His 1992 role as Billy Hoyle in White Men Cant Jump is one of the more iconic portrayals in sports films. He also played Ed Monix in Semi… [+5944 chars]
